original_body_lines: The designer's wedding show 2023 was held at Hilton Hotel in Colombo last night. The Celebrity Designer Wedding Show first took place in 2009 and continued annually until it was disrupted by the Covid-19 pandemic. This year marks the first Celebrity Designer Wedding Show since the pandemic and is also the first time the show joins hands with the Indira Cancer Trust. This year’s Celebrity Designer Wedding Show will feature around 20 prolific designers including famed personalities like Michael Wijesuriya, Ramani Fernando, Dhananjaya Bandara, Poornima Abeyratne, and many others. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
